targets.query: select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.GET.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.POST.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.PUT.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.DELETE.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.check_api/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.*.1\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.*.2\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.*.3\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.*.4\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.neutron.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.neutron-api.servers.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.neutron-api.servers.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.dhcp.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.l3.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.metadata.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.openvswitch.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.dhcp.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.l3.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.metadata.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.openvswitch.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.dhcp.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.l3.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.metadata.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.agents.openvswitch.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.networks$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.networks$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.subnets$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.subnets$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.ports$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.ports$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.routers$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.routers$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.floatingips$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.floatingips$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
